overview: In Joey Silvera's universe, every nubile lass he stumbles across is afflicted with a condition for which there's only one cure. Black Cock Addiction 7 gathers up ten mouth-watering cuties in eight scenes that concentrate on hardcore tea-bagging, throat-gagging, eye-watering fellatio, but even Uncle Joey can't keep these rambunctious youngsters from occasionally taking the magnificent meat on display for test-drives in their tight little twats.
title: Black Cock Addiction 7
